input.sentences: while walking in the woods we saw a lot of cob webs .
look at the nasty spider on the leaf .
there is another type of spider coming down on a web .
we were waiting to get on the subway .
what an awesome creation of a pyramid | very unique .
output.sentences: In the woods, a spider was walking on the webs.
The spider was on the nasty leaf.
The orange type of spider was on the web.
The people were waiting in the subway.
This is a unique pyramid creation.
